participant_1.background:
I like nature.
My favorite color is blue.
I love eating out.
I work full time.

participant_2.background:
I spend a lot of time watching obscure foreign film on netflix.
I prefer eating at home because people make me nervous.
I hate social obligations because i always say the wrong thing.
My dad owns a appliance store that i don t want to inherit.
I like running in marathons.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I like to watch obscure foreign films on Netflix.
Oh, that sounds interesting. What kind of movies do you like to watch?
I like movies that are different from the typical Hollywood blockbusters. I like movies that make me think and movies that make me feel.
I like that too. I think it's important to see movies that challenge you and make you think about the world around you.
Exactly! I also like to watch movies that are visually beautiful. I love movies that take me to another world.
Me too. I love a good story.
Me too. I love movies that have a great story and great characters.
What's your favorite movie?
That's a tough question. I have so many favorite movies. But one of my favorites is "The Great Escape". It's a great story about a group of Allied prisoners of war who escape from a German POW camp.
I've heard of that movie. I've heard it's really good.
It is! It's a classic.
I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a great movie.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I also like to run in marathons.
Oh, that's cool. I've never run a marathon.
It's a lot of fun. It's a great way to challenge yourself and get in shape.
I'm sure it is. I'm not sure if I'm up for that kind of challenge, though.
You should give it a try! It's a lot of fun.
I'll think about it.
You should! It's a great experience.
I'm glad you're enjoying your marathon.
Thanks! It's a lot of fun.
